generic-copilot.consoleView.title: LLM Console
generic-copilot.modelManagement.title: Model Management
error.noProvidersFound: No providers found in generic-copilot.models or generic-copilot.providers. Please configure providers/models first.
dialog.selectProvider.placeHolder: Choose a provider to configure API key
dialog.providerApiKey.title: Provider API key - {provider}
message.iflowOAuthRequired: Detected iFlow provider: this provider requires OAuth login.
message.iflowOAuthProviderMissing: Cannot start iFlow OAuth: missing provider config (select/save a provider first).
message.validateProviderUnsupported: Validation currently supports iFlow provider only.
message.iflowApiKeyMissing: iFlow API key not found. Please complete OAuth login first.
statusBar.tokenCount: Current model token usage - click to open configuration
configuration.title: Generic Compatible Copilot

configuration.providers.description: A list of providers. Models can reference providers to inherit baseUrl. Use the Configuration GUI or edit settings.json.

properties.id: Canonical provider ID (lowercase, used as owned_by and for API key storage).
properties.baseUrl: (Optional) Base URL for the provider API endpoint. Override built-in defaults.
properties.headers: (Optional) Custom HTTP headers for this provider.

configuration.models.description: A list of models. Use the Configuration GUI or edit settings.json.

properties.provider: (Required) Provider ID reference. Allows inheriting API key, baseURL and headers.

model_properties.description: (Optional) Model properties including context_length, family, owned_by, etc.

model_parameters.description: (Optional) Model parameters including temperature and extra request parameters.

configuration.delay: Fixed delay in milliseconds between consecutive requests (default 0).
